title: Get species by feature — get_species_by_feature
text: Output table species present one spatial feature(s).

text: schema.table SCHEMA.TABLE containing feature(s). clause selecting feature(s) area interest.

text: data.frame species present feature(s)

title: Get species by feature — get_species_by_feature
text: Use species_by_feature endpoint API api.marinesensitivity.org.

title: Get species by feature — get_species_by_feature
code: get_species_by_feature(   schema.table = "raw.mr_eez",   where        = "mrgid = 8442") #> # A tibble: 4,797 × 12 #>    sp_key n_cells avg_pct_cell area_km2 avg_suit   amt phylum class order family #>    <chr>    <dbl>        <dbl>    <dbl>    <dbl> <dbl> <chr>  <chr> <chr> <chr>  #>  1 Chn-0…       9        0.750   20765.    0.703 4.75  Arthr… Mala… Deca… Galat… #>  2 Chn-2…       1        0.999    3073.    1     0.999 Arthr… Mala… Deca… Scyll… #>  3 Chn-4…       1        0.999    3073.    1     0.999 Arthr… Mala… Deca… Palae… #>  4 Chn-4…       1        0.999    3073.    0.99  0.989 Arthr… Maxi… Sess… Pyrgo… #>  5 Chn-5…       1        0.999    3073.    0.98  0.979 Arthr… Mala… Deca… Palae… #>  6 Chn-a…       1        0.999    3073.    0.97  0.969 Arthr… Mala… Deca… Coeno… #>  7 Chn-e…       1        0.999    3073.    1     0.999 Arthr… Mala… Deca… Albun… #>  8 Chn-f…       1        0.999    3073.    0.87  0.869 Arthr… Mala… Deca… Munid… #>  9 Fis-1…       1        0.999    3073.    1     0.999 Chord… Acti… Mugi… Mugil… #> 10 Fis-1…       1        0.999    3073.    1     0.999 Chord… Acti… Perc… Labri… #> # ℹ 4,787 more rows #> # ℹ 2 more variables: genus <chr>, species <chr>

text: base_opacity numeric 0 1 (default=0.5)

title: Polygons of BOEM Regions — ply_boemrgns
text: Polygons describing BOEM Outer Continental Shelf (OCS) Regions BOEM Offshore Oil Gas Planning Areas Summarized region name (key): Alaska (AK), Atlantic (ATL), Gulf Mexico (GOM), Pacific (PAC).

title: Polygons of BOEM Regions — ply_boemrgns
text: spatial features sf data frame 5 rows 6 columns: boemrgn_key key BOEM Region boemrgn_name name BOEM Region geom geometry polygon sf::st_geometry() ctr_lon centroid longitude ctr_lat centroid longitude area_km2 area square kilometers

title: Polygons of BOEM Regions — ply_boemrgns
text: BOEM Offshore Oil Gas Planning Areas

what: Query WoRMS REST API with multiple requests — wm_rest
title: Query WoRMS REST API with multiple requests — wm_rest
text: trying perform batch requests WoRMS REST API unfortunately return requested field obvious taxa requested matches response. Even fetching records batch aphia_id functions worrms R package page requests based record limits WoRMS REST API. Finally, much preferred use multiplexing capabilities latest httr2 library send multiple requests parallel, versus one sequentially.

title: Query WoRMS REST API with multiple requests — wm_rest
Query WoRMS REST API with multiple requests — wm_rest
text: df data frame match fld field data frame use operation operation operation name WoRMS REST API; One operations listed marinespecies.org/rest, like "AphiaRecordsByMatchNames" (non-paging), "AphiaRecordsByVernacular" (paging), "AphiaRecordsByNames" (paging), "AphiaRecordsByAphiaIDs" (paging); default: "AphiaRecordsByMatchNames" server URL server REST endpoint; default: "https://www.marinespecies.org/rest" ... query parameters pass operation

title: Query WoRMS REST API with multiple requests — wm_rest
text: data frame results WoRMS API prepended unique values fld

title: Query WoRMS REST API with multiple requests — wm_rest
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ tmp_test <- tibble::tribble(            ~common,                     ~scientific, aphia_id_0,      "Minke whale",     "Balaenoptera acutorostrata", 137087,       "Blue whale",          "Balaenoptera musculus", 137090, "Bonaparte's Gull",   "Chroicocephalus philadelphia", 882954) # 882954 invalid non-marine -> valid marine 159076  wm_exact <- wm_rest(tmp_test, scientific, "AphiaRecordsByMatchNames") wm_fuzzy <- wm_rest(tmp_test, scientific, "AphiaRecordsByNames") wm_byid  <- wm_rest(tmp_test, scientific, "AphiaRecordsByNames", marine_only=F) } # }

title: msens 0.2.0
text: OLD: hierarchy ply_shlfs > ply_rgns (*_s05 simplifications) clipped US EEZ. NEW: hierarchy ply_boemrgns > ply_ecorgns | ply_planareas > ply_ecoareas, intersection ply_ecorgns ply_planareas. Created *_s05 simplifications . new polygons conform BOEM’s original nomenclature “OCS Regions”, Planning Areas” “Ecoregions”. polygons clipped US EEZ.

title: msens 0.1.2
text: Added get_species_by_feature() read API endpoint.

title: msens 0.1.1
text: Added simple ms_basemap() support map app.

title: msens 0.1
text: Added data basic Outer Continental Shelf (OCS) regions ply_shlfs BOEM Planning Regions ply_rgns simplified 5% variants (ply_shlfs_s05, ply_rgns_s05).
